Articles.Content:
After Patch V0.1.2.0 My game has become unstable

When I load a save file from a campaign which I started after installing the new patch the load time has increased drastically and once in the game any actions seem to cause the game to freeze completely. 

Currently I have two vessels orbiting the MUN and a vessel staged on the launch pad. As soon as I launch the rocket, or save the file the program stops responding however the sound continues to play with the screen frozen.

My system specs are as follows:

OS = Windows 10 Home

CPU = i7-11800H @2.30 Ghz with 32GB RAM

GPU= RTX3080 8GB VRAM

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12

The cause of your issue is KSP2 spamming the save files with lots of repeated information.

Follow the following instructions:

https://old.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/129k2lw/i_gained_1020_fps_with_this_simple_fix_in_ksp_2/

Use the following in Windows Explorer to get to the save files in the fastest way:
%userprofile%\appdata\locallow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer

From the little testing I have done it appears to be a permanent fix to the save file issue.
